participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always looking for new tricks to learn on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to play and sing with friends.
participant_2.background: i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i'm in the third grade.

content.text: hi, how are you? I just got back from rob dryden. what is your favourite skater?
